features: Buildable movie memorabilia – Capture the playful spirit of Luxo Jr. with this posable LEGO brick model of the character first seen in the 1986 Disney Pixar animated short film of the same name
Collectible building set for adults – The Luxo Jr. model is fully articulated to recreate the character’s bouncing, hopping and rotating movements
Buildable Disney Pixar Ball – The Pixar Ball contains hidden Easter eggs referencing famous Disney Pixar films: Up, The Incredibles, Ratatouille, Toy Story, Finding Nemo and Monsters, Inc.
Fun home or office desk decor – Remove 2 rounded plates from either side of the Pixar Ball to create a base for Luxo Jr. to stand on, as if it is deflating the Pixar Ball
Disney Pixar gift idea – This model kit makes a fun treat for yourself or a nostalgic gift for men and women who are passionate about Disney Pixar movies
Immerse yourself – Find building instructions on the LEGO Builder app and in the included booklet, which features interviews with the construction set’s fan designer and LEGO designers
The LEGO fans’ choice – This set is from the LEGO Ideas range, where each set is created by a fan designer, voted for by LEGO fans and produced by the LEGO Group
description: From the manufacturer Fun home office desk decor Capture the playful spirit of Luxo Jr. Build an authentically detailed LEGO brick model of the exuberant character from the first CGI animated film ever to be nominated for an Academy award with this collectible LEGO Ideas | Disney Pixar set for adults. Previous page Fully articulated Recreate Luxo Jr.’s bouncing, hopping and rotating movements. Disney Pixar Ball Display Luxo Jr. alongside the buildable Pixar Ball. Alternative display option Remove 2 rounded plates from either side of the Disney Pixar Ball to create a base for Luxo Jr. to stand on, as if it is deflating the ball. Hidden surprises Discover Easter eggs referencing popular films Up, The Incredibles, Ratatouille, Monsters, Inc., Toy Story and Finding Nemo inside the Disney Pixar Ball. Next page Creative fun A joyful, rewarding building experience Tune out the distractions of daily life for a while and immerse yourself in the challenge of creating a detailed brick-built model of an iconic character from the Disney Pixar movie universe. Film decor for the home Delightful Disney Pixar themed set for adults This buildable display model makes a super treat for yourself or a nostalgic gift for men, women and any film lovers who have marvelled at how Disney Pixar brings human movements and emotions to inanimate objects.
